item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Expanded PSYKO is the solo project I’m currently working on. I’ve learnt a lot over the last few years, and I think I have a much better understanding of how to keep my scope down while still focusing on the core value. A solo project is great for this, and the core loop I’ve chosen seems to work well. Its short and tight and so delivers the value quickly. Additionally, I think the short loops are good for headsets, especially the Quest, where playtimes are often shorter in median than your PC play sessions.
